WorkItem.Description: Curse of Elements has been updated to do all four schools of magic, but Curse of Shadows still exists, offering an extra 10-13% on shadow and arcane damage.
WorkItem.Summary: Curse of Shadows still exists in b16

Comments.Message: Also just noticed that CoS is an option in the "Casted Curse" drop down box on the options tab with the Warlock model, although i'd guess it doesn't really do anything.  For completeness, should be removed from the list as well.

Oops. I removed CoS from the embedded default list of buffs, but forgot to remove it from the BuffCache.xml file distributed with Rawr. Delete your BuffCache.xml file, Rawr will automatically recreate it, without CoS.

Arnath, can you take care of fixing up the Warlock model?
